solution_line_template: The reseller wants to get ${bag_cost} x {profit_percentage_numerator}/{profit_percentage_denominator} = $<<{bag_cost}*{profit_percentage_numerator}/{profit_percentage_denominator}={profit_amount}>>{profit_amount} profit.
Thus, she needs to sell it for ${bag_cost} + ${profit_amount} = $<<{bag_cost}+{profit_amount}={selling_price}>>{selling_price}.
